page.title: 08Local Celebrities
page.content: Captain Smith Born in the town of Hanley he was the first and only captain of the Titanic. On its maiden voyage in 1910 the Titanic hit an iceberg and sank. Captain Smith went down with the ship. A plaque was erected in Hanley to mark his birthplace. Sir Stanley Matthews Born in 1915 in Hanley he became a football star.He played for Stoke City,Blackpool and England.He played first team football past the age of 40, finally retiring at the age of 50 as one of the oldest players in the history of the game.He travelled the world coaching and playing.Now resident in Canada he was honoured by the city of Stoke-On-Trent this year to mark his 70th birthday.
